name: My Best Friend Anna
description:
◆ Meet Anna, your new best friend! Anna is a cute little talking girl who desperately needs a buddy like YOU! My Best Friend Anna is right there anytime you need her. Grow up together, play, try on some chic combos, get your nails done, sing your fav song with my talking Anna and do every silly thing best friends would do! Talk to her and she’ll repeat what you say in a silly voice! Embrace your new talking friend in one of the cutest talking games & soon you’ll become the best talking friends ever!

◆ MY BEST FRIEND ANNA HAS AWESOME FEATURES! ◆

◆ Grow together with my talking Anna, your BFF talking girl  
◆ Have infinite number of levels in this talking friends game
◆ Dress her up, bathe her, brush her teeth and more
◆ Pass 30 levels to unlock wonderful outfits, change room decor and more
◆ Play SURPRISE EGGS with your best friend Anna & help her collect extraordinary toys for 10 different shelves
◆ PREMIUM - Get Diva Chest and Princess chest and unlock adorable outfits
◆ Play MINI GAMES with your virtual friend like Juicy splash and collect coins & diamonds
◆ Take a photo with your My Best Friend Anna & show the world you new BFF

When she’s hungry, feed her healthy snacks, bathe her, brush her teeth, dress her up in most adorable outfits and time will fly! Tuck her into her bed when she’s tired of playing, because that’s what true friends are for!

Play this popular BFF GAME and you’re not going to need virtual pet games like Talking Cat Kimmy & Emma the Cat, because you finally have your favorite talking girl - My Best Friend Anna. Download My Best Friend Anna and start goofing around with her!

My Best Friend Anna has been developed by Peaksel - all rights reserved.
